responsibilities: Research and develop advanced machine learning and AI techniques and algorithms
Evaluate algorithm performance using both real-world and simulated data
Design and prototype systems to showcase research innovations
Propose, investigate, and publish research in leading conferences and journals
skills: Developed innovative AI and machine learning algorithms
Trained and evaluated AI models through pre-training, fine-tuning, and reinforcement learning (RL) techniques
Demonstrated strong algorithmic problem-solving and software development skills, particularly with PyTorch
Published research papers in peer-reviewed journals and conferences
Expertise in training multi-modal AI models (preferred)
Proficient in Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback or similar methodologies (preferred)
analysis: The job involves researching and developing advanced machine learning and AI techniques, which could include Generative AI and language models. The responsibilities mention designing and prototyping systems to showcase research innovations, which could involve GenAI or LLMs. The skills section highlights training and evaluating AI models through pre-training, fine-tuning, and reinforcement learning techniques, which are commonly used in developing language models and GenAI systems. Additionally, expertise in training multi-modal AI models and proficiency in Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback are relevant to GenAI and LLMs. The mention of publishing research papers in peer-reviewed journals and conferences suggests a focus on cutting-edge AI technologies, which often include GenAI and LLMs.
